passive.name: Heir
passive.description: Increases the wearer's Energy Regeneration Rate by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> and regenerates 1 Skill Point when the wearer uses their Ultimate on an ally. This effect can be triggered once after every 2 uses of the wearer's Ultimate. When the wearer uses their Skill, the next ally taking action (except the wearer) deals <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color> more DMG for <unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak> turn(s).
